_entries.name: new-npm-package
new-npm-package/HelloDialog.fragment.xml
_entries.code:
<core:FragmentDefinition
   xmlns="sap.m"
   xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
   <Dialog
      title="Hello World">
      <content>
         <Text text="Hello, World! This is a reusable dialog from a UI5 NPM package." />
      </content>
      <beginButton>
         <Button
            id="closeButton"
            text="Close"
            press="onClose" />
      </beginButton>
   </Dialog>
</core:FragmentDefinition>
